name: "WAS" to move... or not?
description: A 2D platformer made for the GMTK Game jam 2020 ( Theme: Out of Control) in which every level the controls change. The player's goal is to get to the portal. The game was  made by a team ( Code by Galse22 and music and art by SammyTom). After playing, if you want to, rat it and tell us on how to improve our next games.
